Hi, I am Digvijay. I am currently working as a Software Engineer II at Microsoft Corporation. Joining Microsoft has been a dream come true, and I’m excited to work with an exceptional group of people, contributing to innovative solutions and the company’s impactful projects. I love exploring emerging technologies and identifying promising trends in research and development. My study primarily focuses on the development of computational methodologies for data-intensive science, and I am ready to leverage my knowledge and skills in the professional arena by solving challenging problems and creating high-quality products.
Previously, I served as a Software Developer and development team lead for Intel’s Adaptive Manufacturing system, a platform used by over 20,000 engineers across Intel factories worldwide. I designed and implemented an advanced equipment recipe management and material handling system using C# on a multi-broker Kafka Cluster on Kubernetes, streamlining operations across Intel fabs. My work focused on developing next-generation automation systems for semiconductor factory processes, database applications, and data analytics.
I received my Master’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Southern California in 2021 and my Bachelor’s degree from the University of Pune, India, where I was honored with The Best Outgoing Student Award and a Gold Medal, presented by Dr. R. Mashelkar, one of India’s pioneering scientists, for my exceptional academic performance.
